titleStmt.title: Three books of occult philosophy written by Henry Cornelius Agrippa of Nettesheim ... ; translated out of the Latin into the English tongue by J.F.
De occulta philosophia. English
titleStmt.author: Agrippa von Nettesheim, Heinrich Cornelius, 1486?-1535.
French, John, 1616-1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for Gregory Moule ...,

notesStmt.note: The translator is probably John French. Cf. DNB.

Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
